text: The original Heal the World Foundation was a nonprofit organization that was established in 1992 by singer Michael Jackson to promote global awareness and support for children and families in need. The foundation's creation was inspired by his charitable single of the same name. The foundation aimed to improve the quality of life for those in underprivileged situations, focusing on health, education, and social issues. It promoted various initiatives, including humanitarian aid, education programs, and efforts to raise awareness about the challenges faced by children worldwide. The organization's missions and projects often reflected Michael Jackson's legacy of caring for humanity and making a positive impact on society. Category:Non-profit organizations of the United States Category:1992 establishments in the United States
title: Heal the World Foundation
